title: Restrap Redesigned its Saddle Pack
content:
Redesigned for 2025, the all-new Restrap Saddle Pack is designed to carry ride essentials more efficiently than ever. Now available in a 4.5- and 2.5-liter package, these new Saddle Packs can fit just about every frame size. A new orange PU lining is seam-sealed to keep the elements at bay and make spotting items in the bag that much easier.  A rigid internal structure keeps the bag stable, no matter how full or empty it is. Redesigned attachment straps mean that the bag sits snugly against the saddle and seatpost. There’s no sway here.

Check out the all-new Saddle Pack at Restrap.

Restrap is distributed by BTI in the USA from Santa Fe, NM.
